# My first cool idea 

#### Keywords {-}

Agribot for Developing countries farmers 

## A beginning.
Idea is to build a bot which can automatically parse messages, pictures from N languages and provide farmers with important information to improve yield and productivity.  
## A middle.
Scope includes initially using data from markets where farmers are provided feedback on prices, weather and training the bot to gather insights on topics.
